plot: An isolated young inventor struggles to make a friend, literally. In his quest to create his ultimate friend, a robot named Scrappy, Jacob discovers true friendship.
title: Jacob: The Movie
plot_es: An isolated young inventor struggles to make a friend, literally. In his quest to create his ultimate friend, a robot named Scrappy, Jacob discovers true friendship.
plot_en: An isolated young inventor struggles to make a friend, literally. In his quest to create his ultimate friend, a robot named Scrappy, Jacob discovers true friendship.
